td.content: s:a 72 YO white m retired presents with critical cough, Respiratory. he has history of critical shortness of breath. he denies drinking alcohol he denies smoking o:Height 72 in, Weight 168 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15, VQ Scan shows three areas of ventlation perfusion mismatch in right lung, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, wheeze-RU, CTA-LR a:Shortness of Breath p:administered Heparin - 50 u/kg IV til therapeutic, performed VQ Scan, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a 74 YO white male says he is having symptoms of critical cough 14 x week, mostly during the day. o:Height 73 in, Weight 173 lbs, Temperature 98.9 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, wheeze-RU, CTA-LR a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

s:white M aged 74 Ys presents with 2 years history of critical shortness of breath, Respiratory. patient reports critical cough. he denies smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 73 in, Weight 172 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, wheeze-RU, CTA-LR a:Shortness of Breath p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Heparin - 50 u/kg IV til therapeutic, and ordered Lung transplantation - right lung.
